mapper.select: SELECT I.name AS item_name, I.image_url AS item_image_url, I.category_id, IO.item_option_id, IO.item_option, S.shop_id, S.name AS shop_name FROM ITEM I LEFT JOIN ITEM_OPTION IO ON I.item_id = IO.item_id LEFT JOIN SHOP S ON I.shop_id = S.shop_id WHERE S.shop_id=#{shopId} AND I.category_id=#{categoryId}
